name: Peter
what_you_do: Peter Kozodoy is the author of Honest to Greatness, an Inc. 5000 serial entrepreneur, TEDx speaker and business coach who works with organizations and their leaders to help them overcome self-limiting bullsh*t and use brutal honesty to achieve massive success.
offering: Peter offers keynote speaking, workshops, and personal coaching services.
social_proof: Peter is an Inc. 5000 serial entrepreneur, TEDx speaker, and has appeared in Inc., Forbes, The Huffington Post.
signature_programs: Honest to Greatness (book), TEDx talks, coaching and consulting services
business_focus: Helping organizations and leaders overcome self-limiting beliefs and use brutal honesty to achieve massive success.
